body: {"name": "Public Sample Workflow", "description": "A sample workflow to test public visibility and forking", "method": "POST", "path": "/api/sample-public", "isPublic": true, "visibility": "public", "nodes": [{"id": "node-1", "type": "start", "data": {"label": "Start"}, "position": {"x": 100, "y": 100}}, {"id": "node-2", "type": "http", "data": {"label": "HTTP Request", "url": "https://api.public-example.com/data", "method": "GET"}, "position": {"x": 300, "y": 100}}, {"id": "node-3", "type": "end", "data": {"label": "End"}, "position": {"x": 500, "y": 100}}], "edges": [{"id": "edge-1", "source": "node-1", "target": "node-2", "sourceHandle": "output", "targetHandle": "input"}, {"id": "edge-2", "source": "node-2", "target": "node-3", "sourceHandle": "output", "targetHandle": "input"}]}
